message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $90 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product for $95.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I still believe I can find the product at a lower price. I am willing to pay $90 for it.
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I'm now willing to sell the product for $92.50.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my needs. I am willing to pay $90 for the product.

Hi Bob, I've already gone as low as I can. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $100, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider selling it to someone else.
